This excpetion s followed by many other such as

!ENTRY org.eclipse.cdt.core 4 4 2007-05-30 15:45:22.440
!MESSAGE Error while parsing XYZ_test.cpp.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

*without* a call stack. Probably it's the same?

All these files include
#include <boost/test/unit_test.hpp>
#include <boost/test/floating_point_comparison.hpp>
so it is probably a parser error in these header files.
I use Boost 1.33.1.

Jens
I have already fixed this together with bug 191198.
